Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Removes post-retirement earnings restrictions for New York city department of corrections uniformed personnel
Summary: Removes post-retirement earnings restrictions for New York city department of correction uniformed personnel with respect to a retiree subsequent to such member's earliest eligibility date for service retirement.
LawCode: Amd ยง507-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to eligibility of uniformed personnel of the New York city department of correction for ordinary disability benefits
